conversation.content: I need to update the shipping address for order number 8847-TK. It shipped yesterday to the wrong location.
I understand the urgency of this situation. Let me pull up order 8847-TK right away and check the current status of your shipment to see what options we have available.
The package is going to my old office. I need it redirected to my home address immediately.
I can see your package left our distribution center at 6:47 AM this morning and is currently with carrier facility CF-294 in transit to the original destination.
What are my options for intercepting it? This contains critical documents I need by Friday.
Absolutely.
Can you initiate a delivery intercept right now? I have my new address ready to provide.

I'm initiating the intercept request immediately through our priority system. Please provide your new delivery address, and I'll need to verify it matches the billing address on account 4492-BK7 for security purposes.
The new address is 4821 Riverside Drive, Suite 200, Portland, Oregon, 97205.
Thank you, I've entered 4821 Riverside Drive, Suite 200, Portland, Oregon 97205 into our system, and the intercept request has been submitted with reference number INT-3847-M92.
When will I know if the intercept was successful? I need confirmation before end of business today.
You'll receive an email confirmation within 2 hours to your registered address, and I'm also scheduling a courtesy callback for 3:30 PM Pacific Time to confirm the intercept status directly.
Good. What happens if the intercept fails and it delivers to the wrong address?

If the intercept fails, our recovery team will immediately dispatch a courier to retrieve the package from the original address within 24 hours, and we'll overnight it to your Portland location at no additional charge.
I need written documentation of this service guarantee. Can you send that with the confirmation?
Certainly.
Also, please update my default shipping address in your system to prevent this happening again.
I've updated your default shipping address to the Portland location effective immediately, and this change is reflected across all active subscriptions under account 4492-BK7 as of 11:42 AM today.
Perfect. Please confirm the total timeframe for delivery to the new address if the intercept succeeds.

With a successful intercept, your package will arrive at 4821 Riverside Drive by Thursday at 5:00 PM, which is one business day later than the original Wednesday delivery to accommodate the rerouting through facility HUB-7X.

scenario: wanting to update their shipping address for an order already in transit
